title: 生成一个穿盔甲的刷怪笼
author: 基基怪物
txt_content:
版本1.12  我想弄一个穿钻石套,手拿钻石剑的僵尸刷怪笼,请问大神怎么弄吖....我试了半天都生成不出来..
setblock ~ ~2 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {MaxSpawnDelay:10,MinSpawnDelay:10,SpawnCount:2,Delay:10,RequiredPlayerRange:100,SpawnRange:10,MaxNearbyEntities:5,SpawnData:{id:zombie},ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:diamond_boots",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:diamond_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:diamond_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"minecraft:diamond_helmet",Count:1b}],HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:diamond_sword",Count:1b},{}]}这样生成不出来......求大神发个..

replies.author: 基基怪物
replies.txt_content:
pineapple_ 发表于 2017-10-3 23:07
谢谢昨天晚上我自己弄出来了..就是那个SpawnData:{id:zombie} 后面不该加那个括号

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
基基怪物 发表于 2017-10-4 20:59
谢谢昨天晚上我自己弄出来了..就是那个SpawnData:{id:zombie} 后面不该加那个括号 ...
不是不加，是要把标签放进括号里

replies.author: 基基怪物
replies.txt_content:
pineapple_ 发表于 2017-10-4 21:02
不是不加，是要把标签放进括号里
嗯嗯,谢谢您了...那个钻石套僵尸也是你告诉我的..谢谢您
